contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Reach out to us and let's build something amazing together.

team.name: Esmaeil
team.role: Pactus GUI Manager & Flutter Team Lead
team.bio: I am a Flutter and Android developer with 8+ years of experience, building scalable and production-grade apps in retail, fintech, and blockchain. I have led Flutter teams on 3+ products, focusing on clean architecture and modular implementations that reduced future development costs by 50%. As an active open-source contributor, I'm passionate about ensuring product success through technical excellence.
team.specialty: UI Architecture • Modular Scaling • Blockchain GUI Integrations
team.education: Associate Degree in Computer Software Engineering
team.contribution: As the technical lead of Tarvix, I architect and deliver scalable Flutter and Android apps with clean, modular structures. I design and manage CI/CD pipelines and automated testing to ensure high-quality, efficient delivery. I mentor the team on UI/UX, cross-platform strategy, and integration to align product vision with technical excellence.

team.name: Iman Yarahmadi
team.bio: I am a skilled mobile developer with experience in both native Android and Flutter development. I specialize in creating robust, high-performance applications with clean architecture and optimized state management. With experience in fintech, education, and service industries, I focus on delivering seamless user experiences while keeping up with the latest Flutter techniques.
team.specialty: State Management • Performance Optimization • Custom Package Development
team.education: MSc in Computer Science | Software Engineering
team.contribution: As a Flutter developer at Samim Solutions, I design and optimize features for the Daneshjouyar platform serving 50,000+ university students. I implement clean architecture, write comprehensive tests, and develop reusable UI components to maintain code quality and team productivity. I actively contribute to the Flutter community through open-source packages and technical articles.

team.name: Milad
team.bio: Backend Developer with 3+ years of experience designing scalable microservices and high-uptime systems. I specialize in blockchain integration, real-time solutions, and secure architecture design. Proficient in CI/CD pipelines, message brokers, and performance optimization, I partner with teams to deliver robust backend systems that drive project success.
team.specialty: Microservices Architecture • Blockchain Integration • High-Performance Systems
team.contribution: As a backend engineer, I design and implement scalable microservices architectures using Nest.js and Golang. I optimize system performance through CI/CD automation, database query optimization, and real-time communication solutions. My blockchain expertise enables secure integration of crypto payment systems and smart contracts into traditional backend infrastructures.
experience: Reduced API response times by 35% through query optimization

team.name: Sina Soujeh
team.bio: I am a multidisciplinary product designer with expertise in UI/UX design and design systems. With experience across education, finance, and enterprise applications, I create intuitive interfaces that bridge user needs with business goals. My background in computer engineering gives me technical insight that enhances my design solutions.
team.specialty: Design Systems • Admin Panels • UX Research
team.contribution: As a Lead Product Designer at Samim Group, I create comprehensive design systems and oversee UI/UX for multiple admin panels and applications. I conduct user research, usability testing, and competitor analysis to deliver data-driven designs. My technical background enables effective collaboration with development teams to ensure design feasibility and implementation quality.
experience: Lead Product Designer at Samim Group

cards.title: Our Story
cards.content: Tarvix is a semi-independent dev team collaborating with Pactus blockchain. We specialize in Flutter and Fluent UI design systems.

cards.title: Our Mission
cards.content: To create seamless dApp & GUI experiences that hide blockchain complexity behind beautiful, intuitive interfaces.

techStack.title: Our Technology Stack
techStack.subtitle: Cross-platform development solutions for all platforms

projects.title: Pactus Node Managment
projects.description: The Pactus GUI is a user-friendly graphical interface designed to simplify interaction with the Pactus Node Management system, allowing users to easily monitor node status, configure settings, and manage blockchain operations without needing deep technical knowledge.
projects.goals: Simplify deployment and unified management of blockchain nodes with an easy-to-use interface. Ensure secure, scalable operations integrated seamlessly into the Pactus ecosystem.
achievements: 100% optimization of release pipeline
100% completion of node setup and seed restoration
25% progress on node-to-server connectivity
Successfully tested with smooth performance on macOS, Windows, and Linux

teamMembers.name: Esmaeil
teamMembers.role: Flutter Team Lead / Pactus GUI Manager

projects.title: Daneshjouyar
projects.description: A robust platform enhancing student life for over 50,000 Islamic Azad University students. Features include modules for food, dormitory, and insurance services, ensuring a seamless user experience.
projects.goals: Enhance student life through a comprehensive platform with optimized features and seamless performance.
achievements: Customized packages like Jalali Flutter Date Picker and Fast Cached Image for enhanced functionality.
Implemented unit, widget, and BLoC tests to ensure robust code quality.
Boosted application performance using Flutter DevTools and Profile Mode.
Created reusable UI components with WidgetBook for consistency.

projects.title: AFC 2023 Prediction App
projects.description: An interactive app designed to enrich user participation and enjoyment during the AFC 2023 event with prediction features.
projects.projectType: Official Project at Noafarinan Dadeh Pardaz Savis
projects.goals: Enhance user engagement through interactive elements and real-time predictions.
achievements: Developed interactive features to boost user participation.
Ensured seamless performance and user satisfaction.

projects.title: Golrang Industrial Group Admin Panels
projects.description: Admin panels developed for Golrang Industrial Group to adapt seamlessly to backend shifts and streamline operations.
projects.projectType: Official Project at Noafarinan Dadeh Pardaz Savis
projects.goals: Provide flexible and efficient admin tools to manage backend workflows and enhance customer connections.
achievements: Adapted seamlessly to backend changes without predefined models.
Streamlined operations with efficient order submissions.

projects.title: Customer Club Apps
projects.description: Loyalty wallet platforms and customer engagement tools developed for Gardeshgari Bank and Tobank Neobank to elevate user satisfaction and loyalty.
projects.projectType: Official Project at Noafarinan Dadeh Pardaz Savis
projects.goals: Enhance user engagement and loyalty through versatile apps and admin interfaces.
achievements: Integrated features to heighten user engagement and loyalty.
Boosted usability and customer approval with sleek, responsive designs.

projects.title: Visitor App for Golrang
projects.description: A visitor app developed for Golrang Industrial Group to enable efficient order submissions, streamlining operations similar to a delivery platform.
projects.projectType: Official Project at Noafarinan Dadeh Pardaz Savis
projects.goals: Streamline operations and enhance efficiency for visitors and order submissions.
achievements: Enabled efficient order submissions for visitors.
Streamlined operations with a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Custom Flutter Packages
projects.description: Custom Flutter packages enhancing date picking and image caching with tailored functionality.
projects.goals: Provide reusable solutions for Flutter developers to enhance date picking and image caching.
achievements: Published on pub.dev for community use.
Tailored functionality to address specific project requirements.

projects.title: Admin Panel Microservices
projects.description: A scalable microservices-based admin panel designed to improve management efficiency and enable real-time monitoring of 10+ services.
projects.goals: Enhance management efficiency and real-time monitoring capabilities through a robust microservices architecture.
achievements: Developed 200+ comprehensive unit tests, increasing code coverage from 65% to 95%.
Reduced post-deployment bugs by 30%.
Containerized 12 microservices with Docker, cutting deployment time by 40%.
Migrated from Kafka to RabbitMQ, enhancing performance and reliability.

projects.title: TON Crypto Payment System
projects.description: A revolutionary cryptocurrency payment solution using TON (The Open Network), offering user-friendly and flexible transactions.
projects.goals: Streamline cryptocurrency transactions with automated processes and enhanced security features.
achievements: Automated consolidation of $50K+/month in transactions, cutting reconciliation time by 90%.
Implemented dynamic wallet generation for enhanced security and convenience.
Enabled customizable deposits for user flexibility.

projects.title: ChatBuddy – AI-Powered Telegram Bot
projects.description: An AI-powered Telegram bot serving 50+ groups, processing 1,200+ messages daily with high accuracy and uptime.
projects.goals: Provide a reliable and scalable conversational AI solution for Telegram users.
achievements: Engineered in Go for massive concurrency, serving tens of thousands of users with sub-50 ms response times.
Achieved 98% contextual accuracy and 99.9% uptime.
Implemented a fully automated CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions.

projects.title: WebSocket Notification System
projects.description: A real-time notification system engineered to deliver messages with low latency, enhancing user engagement.
projects.goals: Reduce latency and improve user engagement with real-time notifications.
achievements: Delivered notifications with <100 ms latency for 500 concurrent users.
Boosted group engagement by 20% compared to polling-based solutions.

projects.title: Database Query Optimization
projects.description: Optimized database queries to enhance API performance and scalability for high-traffic applications.
projects.goals: Improve API response times and scalability for large user bases.
achievements: Reduced API response times by 35%.
Enhanced scalability for 20,000+ monthly active users.

projects.title: Persian Ant Design System
projects.description: A custom design system developed for Samim Group to standardize UI components and ensure consistency across admin panels and applications.
projects.goals: Create a unified design language for all Samim Group products to improve usability and maintainability.
achievements: Developed a comprehensive design system tailored for Persian language interfaces.
Ensured consistency across multiple admin panels and applications.

projects.title: Financial Spanel
projects.description: An admin panel designed for financial management within Samim Group, providing tools for monitoring and analyzing financial data.
projects.goals: Streamline financial operations and provide real-time insights into financial data.
achievements: Designed an intuitive interface for complex financial data visualization.
Improved user efficiency in financial monitoring tasks.

projects.title: Kouleh App Custom Design System
projects.description: A custom design system created for the Kouleh mobile application to ensure a cohesive and user-friendly experience.
projects.goals: Enhance user experience and maintain design consistency across the Kouleh app.
achievements: Developed reusable UI components for faster development cycles.
Ensured a seamless user experience across all app screens.

projects.title: Daneshjouyar Landing Page
projects.description: A landing page designed for Daneshjouyar, a platform serving students, to attract and inform potential users.
projects.goals: Create an engaging and informative landing page to drive user sign-ups and engagement.
achievements: Designed a visually appealing and user-friendly interface.
Improved conversion rates through optimized layout and content structure.

projects.title: Grass.io Spanel
projects.description: An admin panel designed for Grass.io, a project under Synthetic Solutions, to manage and monitor platform operations.
projects.goals: Provide an efficient and intuitive interface for managing Grass.io platform operations.
achievements: Designed a clean and functional admin interface.
Enhanced user productivity through streamlined workflows.

projects.title: Hamdam App
projects.description: A mobile application designed for Tebyan Smart, focusing on user engagement and support.
projects.goals: Create a user-friendly app to enhance engagement and provide support services.
achievements: Designed an intuitive and accessible user interface.
Conducted usability tests to refine the user experience.

projects.title: Dropzone Landing Page
projects.description: A landing page designed for Dropzone, a project under Synthetic Solutions, to attract and inform users about the platform.
projects.goals: Drive user engagement and conversions through an appealing and informative landing page.
achievements: Created a visually striking design to capture user attention.
Optimized layout for better user engagement and conversion rates.

projects.title: Mohsen Grocery Ecosystem
projects.description: Complete grocery management system including customer app, delivery tracking, warehouse tools, and Bluetooth receipt printing for chain stores.
projects.goals: Streamline operations for grocery chains with integrated mobile solutions.
achievements: Developed warehouse management application
Implemented Bixolon Bluetooth thermal printing
Created delivery tracking system
Built customer-facing shopping application

projects.title: Investment School Online
projects.description: An educational platform for investment training, available on multiple platforms including Windows and Android.
projects.goals: Create accessible investment education across multiple platforms.
achievements: Developed Windows and Android versions
Implemented auto-update functionality
Published on multiple app stores

projects.title: Flutter Open Source Packages
projects.description: Collection of published Flutter packages providing various utilities including encryption, platform detection, glass UI effects, IP detection, and faded list animations.
projects.goals: Contribute to Flutter ecosystem with reusable components.
achievements: Published 5 packages on pub.dev
Maintained MIT-licensed open source code
Supported multiple platforms (mobile/desktop/web)

projects.title: Mentor Educational App
projects.description: A mobile learning platform with media-rich content and cross-platform support, developed for both Android and iOS.
projects.goals: Create engaging educational experience with offline capabilities.
achievements: Added new features to existing codebase
Fixed critical issues for both platforms
Created comprehensive documentation
Optimized performance for media content

projects.title: WinMarket Chain Store System
projects.description: A comprehensive solution for chain supermarkets including client apps, delivery management, and inventory control with Bluetooth printing capabilities.
projects.goals: Digital transformation for supermarket chains with real-time inventory and order management.
achievements: Developed multi-role applications (client/delivery/picker)
Implemented Bixolon Bluetooth thermal printing functionality
Created inventory management system with real-time sync
Built 80% of customer-facing application codebase

projects.title: Bixolon Bluetooth Printing Module
projects.description: Custom Flutter plugin for thermal receipt printing via Bixolon Bluetooth devices, integrated into multiple retail applications.
projects.goals: Enable reliable receipt printing across retail applications.
achievements: Developed cross-platform Bluetooth printing solution
Implemented in WinMarket and Mohsen apps
Achieved 100% print success rate
Supported multiple receipt formats
